sentences.en: A committee has been formed. These people can make decisions in ten minutes which would take us months.
sentences.cn: 委员会已经成立。这些人能在10分钟内做出决定，换作我们则要花几个月。

sentences.en: Are these all yours?
sentences.cn: 这些都是你的吗?

sentences.en: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.cn: 当你出去走入社会时你把这些思想牢记在心。

sentences.en: I get a bit uptight these days. Hormones, I suppose.
sentences.cn: 这些天我有点焦躁。我看是荷尔蒙在作怪。

sentences.en: I have no answer of these at all.
sentences.cn: 对于这些，我也不知道答案。

sentences.en: I like these and he likes those.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这些，他喜欢那些。

sentences.en: I like these but she likes those.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这些，而她喜欢那些。

sentences.en: I shall have words with these stupid friends of mine!
sentences.cn: 我真应该跟我这些愚蠢的朋友理论理论！

sentences.en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentences.cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentences.en: If they value these data, let them pay for them.
sentences.cn: 他们要是看重这些数据，就让他们出钱买。

sentences.en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentences.cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentences.en: Jackie was running around with all these brilliant people.
sentences.cn: 杰姬混迹于这些才华横溢的人之间。

sentences.en: Neat solutions are not easily found to these issues.
sentences.cn: 很难找到解决这些问题的巧妙办法。

sentences.en: Somehow he tells these stories without a note of horror.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他讲这些故事时一点都不害怕。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office in London has expressed surprise at these allegations.
sentences.cn: 位于伦敦的英国外交部对这些说法表示惊讶.

sentences.en: These chaps know their stuff after seven years of war.
sentences.cn: 7年的战争过后，这些家伙都成了作战行家。

sentences.en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentences.cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentences.cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

sentences.en: These feelings are likely to make people attempt to overthrow the system.
sentences.cn: 这些情绪有可能促使人们想要推翻现行的体制。

sentences.en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
sentences.cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

sentences.en: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.cn: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.en: We are taught to construe these terms in a particular way.
sentences.cn: 我们被教导要以特定的方式理解这些词语。

sentences.en: We shall go through these papers together.
sentences.cn: 我们将在一起审阅这些论文。

trans.tran_en: You use these at the beginning of noun groups to refer to someone or something that you have already mentioned or identified
at the beginning of noun groups to refer to someone or something that you have already mentioned or identified
